title: Airtable & Notion 4.0
description: This project was created to learn modern programming languages by improving the Sweetwater Music Center website, enhancing booking processes, and ensuring a seamless user experience for students.

title: DonsEats: On-Campus Food Ordering System
description: This project was built to enhance web development skills by creating a platform that simplifies on-campus food ordering, offering features like real-time tracking and scheduled pickups for a seamless dining experience.

title: Chest X-ray Disease Classification Using Convolutional Neural Networks
description: Built a deep learning pipeline to classify chest X-rays into 14 disease categories using the NIH dataset, leveraging advanced techniques like custom CNNs, transfer learning, and data augmentation to enhance AI-driven healthcare diagnostics.

title: PFW Question Answering System
description: This project was created to explore natural language processing by developing a question-answering system using models like BERT, RoBERTa, and XLNet. It enhances user experience on university websites by accurately answering student queries about housing, amenities, and campus topics.

title: QuestSpot: Docode the clues, decode the world
description: This project was designed to advance cross-platform development skills by building a multi-language Flutter-Firebase scavenger hunt app. Integrated Gemini AI to generate location-based clues, offering features like difficulty levels, game-sharing, bonus point analysis, heatmaps, and dark/light themes for Android and iOS.
